workflows.name: codify-adr
workflows.description: Creates a new Architecture Decision Record (ADR) with proper numbering and template.

workflows.name: post-move-link-check
workflows.description: Run link checker after moving or renaming files/folders

workflows.name: spec-kitty.analyze
workflows.description: Perform a non-destructive cross-artifact consistency and quality analysis across spec.md, plan.md, and tasks.md after task generation.

workflows.name: spec-kitty.checklist
workflows.description: Generate a custom checklist for the current feature based on user requirements.

workflows.name: spec-kitty.clarify
workflows.description: Identify underspecified areas in the current feature spec by asking up to 5 highly targeted clarification questions and encoding answers back into the spec.

workflows.name: spec-kitty.constitution
workflows.description: Create or update the project constitution from interactive or provided principle inputs, ensuring all dependent templates stay in sync.

workflows.name: spec-kitty.implement
workflows.description: Execute the implementation plan by processing and executing all tasks defined in tasks.md

workflows.name: spec-kitty.plan
workflows.description: Execute the implementation planning workflow using the plan template to generate design artifacts.

workflows.name: spec-kitty.specify
workflows.description: Create or update the feature specification from a natural language feature description.

workflows.name: spec-kitty.tasks-to-issues
workflows.description: Convert existing tasks into actionable, dependency-ordered GitHub issues for the feature based on available design artifacts.

workflows.name: spec-kitty.tasks
workflows.description: Generate an actionable, dependency-ordered tasks.md for the feature based on available design artifacts.

workflows.name: workflow-adr
workflows.description: Manage Architecture Decision Records (ADR)

workflows.name: workflow-audit
workflows.description: Protocol 128 Phase IV - Red Team Audit (Capture Snapshot)

workflows.name: workflow-bundle
workflows.description: Create a markdown bundle from a set of files using a manifest.

workflows.name: workflow-chronicle
workflows.description: Manage Chronicle Entries (Journaling)

workflows.name: workflow-end
workflows.description: Standard post-flight closure for all codify/investigate workflows. Handles human review, git commit, PR verification, and cleanup.

workflows.name: workflow-ingest
workflows.description: Run RAG Ingestion (Protocol 128 Phase IX)

workflows.name: workflow-learning-loop
workflows.description: "Standard operating procedure for Protocol 128 Hardened Learning Loop (Scout -> Synthesize -> Audit -> Seal -> Persist)."

workflows.name: workflow-persist
workflows.description: Protocol 128 Phase VI - Soul Persistence (Broadcast to Hugging Face)

workflows.name: workflow-protocol
workflows.description: Manage Protocol Documents

workflows.name: workflow-retrospective
workflows.description: Mandatory self-retrospective and continuous improvement check after completing any codify workflow.

workflows.name: workflow-scout
workflows.description: Protocol 128 Phase I - The Learning Scout (Debrief & Orientation)

workflows.name: workflow-seal
workflows.description: Protocol 128 Phase V - The Technical Seal (Snapshot & Validation)

workflows.name: workflow-start
workflows.description: Universal pre-flight and Spec initialization for all workflows. Determines work type and ensures Spec-Plan-Tasks exist.

workflows.name: workflow-task
workflows.description: Manage Maintenance Tasks (Kanban)

workflows.name: workflow-tool-update
workflows.description: Update tool inventories, RLM cache, and associated artifacts after creating or modifying tools.
